descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 of a random status, chosen from Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, and Sinking
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 6 of a random status, chosen from Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, and Sinking
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 10 of a random status, chosen from Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, and Sinking

passiveList.desc:
At the start of the turn, if below 25% HP, heal 15 HP and gain 2 [Protection].
When this effect activates, inflict 1 random other ally & 1 random enemy with +2 [MentalSystemResultDecrease_Typo].
passiveList.name: Uncontrolled Morph
